sources.title: City Park
sources.description: * Released: 1934-05-01 * Comedy/Crime/Romance (Eng US) * Chesterfield Motion Pictures Corporation at Universal City * RCA VICTOR "High Fidelity" Sound System * PRODUCER: Geo. R. Batcheller * DIRECTOR: Richard Thorpe * SCREENPLAY: Karl Brown * STARRING: Sally Blane; Henry B. Walthall; Hale Hamilton; Judith Vosselli; Matty Kemp; John Harron * SYNOPSIS: Young woman, down on her luck, is taken under the wings of 3 older strangers, 3 good friends who vow to watch over her to ensure her future greatly improves. * SOURCE: 1) MrFilmschatten 2) Wikipedia (Translation) 3) IMDb * I own zero rights to this film (financially or otherwise) and was unable to discover whether this film is or is not in the Public Domain. I have uploaded for Educational purposes only, for all present and future generations and will gladly remove from IA, should this film be found to not yet be in the Public Domain. Respectfully yours, Doreen (def gp ddh)

metadata.Plot: The old men meet a young girl, broke, hungry and discouraged, in the park. Colonel Henry Randolph Ransome (Henry B. Walthall) bluffs his way into obtaining enough money to support the welfare of the girl,Rose Wentworth (Sally Blane), and his two cronies. He sends for the girl's former sweetheart, who turns out to be a crook.
metadata.Actors: Sally Blane, Henry B. Walthall, Matty Kemp
